The
has information on where to eat, stay and play! The center, located at 113 S High Street, also houses the Economic Development Commission, Keep San Saba Beautiful Commission, and the
[San Saba County Chamber of Commerce](https://sansabachamber.org/)
. Hours of operation are Monday – Friday, 9:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. and Saturday 9:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m.

The center is a great starting point to explore the town. Drop by to chat with our friendly San Saba guide for where to eat, stay and shop! Don’t forget to pick up a map of our
[Historic Downtown Walking Tour](https://sansabatexas.com/about-san-saba/historic-downtown-tour/)
. It is a fun way to unlock the past hidden within the walls of our historic downtown district.

For additional information about San Saba and its tourist attractions, check out
[Visit San Saba](https://visitsansabatexas.com/)
.
